title: New: Alicia Eris – The 21st
body:
Having taken a little while off from ‘blogging’, what better to come back to than a brand new track from San Diego’s **Alicia Eris**.

The follow-up to her mightily impressive debut track [I Moved On](www.crackintheroad.com/music/23529-introducing-alicia-eris/) that saw her gaining coverage from several top blogs, _The 21st_ recalls more of the soulful Winehouse inspirations that she refers to. Check out _The 21st_ below.
